text:
By Rachel Nussbaum 4 hours ago 
Nordstrom — it's a good place! The department store will always hold fond memories for many a fashion and beauty lover. There's nothing like escaping into the counters while your mom shops, spraying on a million perfumes in the hopes in the hopes of finding your ~signature scent at age twelve. But be that as it may, you may be feeling the Nordstrom love extra hard these days, and it's a good thing too, because the brand recently upped their game with a roll-out of new, of the moment brands. With K-beauty picks, natural brands, and mainstay labels, the online shopping experience especially is the best of every world. Think SOKOGlam!, meets Credo Beauty , meets Sephora, meets our dreams. 
Moving on, their fashion department has always been solid, and their shoe selection is looking especially appealing recently. There's just something in the air... who could put their finger on it exactly?! Something that makes me want to shop and continue to help Nordstrom stock to grow , it's a very specific urge. Their athleisure also kills it, as does their plus size selection. With the store's consistent high quality and meritocracy stocking, the motto of the moment is definitely "take all our money." Here are 23 things to buy at Nordstrom if you're feeling love for the brand right now. 1. MAC Nude Lip Kit 
MAC Nude Lip Kit, $42.50, Nordstrom.com 
This set with M.A.C.'s Lipstick in Yash, a peachy neutral, Retro Matte Liquid Lipcolor in Lady-Be Good, and Lip Pencil in Subculture will help channel the '60s while breaking all the decade's norms. 2. Bobbi Brown Clarity Rescue Kit 
Bobbi Brown Clarity Rescue Kit, $35, Nordstrom.com 
I'm a sucker for vials, but the stuff in these little guys holds up. Bobbi Brown's Remedies are winning rave reviews , and this trio of the Skin Reviver, Clarifier and Relief takes out all the guesswork. 3. Leonor Greyl Masque Quintessence Hair Mask 
Leonor Greyl 'Masque Quintessence' Hair Mask, $145, Nordstrom.com 
This mask is a definite investment, but with an all-out fantastic review from New York Mag , it's worth it for high-stressed hair. Their headline is literally "This $145 Hair Mask Is Worth Every Penny," which is compelling. 4. Lanolips Lemonaid Lip Treatment 
Lanolips Lemonaid Lip Treatment, $16, Nordstrom.com 
Lanolips' hero is their fantastically effective lanolin-based balm , but if you have a million and one lip balms in every single purse, this squeeze tube buffing treatment tastes delicious. 5. Kate Somerville ExfoliKate® Intensive Exfoliating Treatment 
Kate Somerville ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment, $24, Nordstrom.com 
This exfoliating treatment consistently shows up on holy grail lists , because it's just that good. With both chemical and physical exfoliant ingredients, you feel new afterwards. 6. Chanel Le Rouge Crayon de Couleur 
Chanel Le Rouge Crayon de Couleur in Carmin Le, $37, Nordstrom.com 
Packed with luscious color, the new Chanel crayons' high-shine finish are a change of pace among the mattes. They're similar in concept to Maybelline's Baby Lips Color Balm Crayons, but since it's Chanel, you'll feel high fashion. 7. Herbivore Botanicals Coconut Soak 
Herbivore Botanicals Coconut Soak, $18, Nordstrom.com 
This finely-milled coconut powder makes for the *most* amazingly silky water. 8. Kiehl's Since 1851 Midnight Recovery Concentrate 
Kiehl's Since 1851 Midnight Recovery Concentrate, $46, Nordstrom.com 
This Kiehl's serum is the swear-by for ultra-smooth skin. If you were thinking about taking the plunge (it's a dropper pun) there's never been a better time. 9. Giorgio Armani Power Fabric Foundation 
Giorgio Armani Power Fabric Foundation, $64, Nordstrom.com 
Armani's Maestro foundation is a classic, and this update stays true to the formula's masterful roots — while adding a long-lasting, full-coverage spin. As a beautiful bonus, it comes in dark shades that are actually dark. 10. R. NICHOLS Blue Jasmine Scented Candle 
R. NICHOLS 'Blue Jasmine' Scented Candle, $38, Nordstrom.com 
Burn a relaxing candle while scrolling through Twitter so you don't let the news stress you out too much. 11. France Luxe Elodie Cuff Ponytail Holder 
France Luxe Elodie Cuff Ponytail Holder, $18, Nordstrom.com 
A chic ponytail holder? Who would have thought such a thing existed! 12. Living proof® Restore Perfecting Spray 
Living proof® Restore Perfecting Spray, $28, Nordstrom.com 
Living Proof's new leave-in spray ups the bar for moisturizing treatments, a conditioning detangler that doesn't weigh down strands. 13. Becca Etc Electric Current One-Piece Swimsuit 
Becca Etc Electric Current One-Piece Swimsuit, $128, Nordstrom.com 
If you actually, seriously want an escape from everything, this suit blends a streamlined silhouette with serious Bond Girl vibes. 14. Nike Pro Indy Sports Bra 
Nike Pro Indy Sports Bra, $40, Nordstrom.com 
Nike's Indy sports bra is a tried and true favorite, with a combo of interesting (but not difficult ) straps and comfort hold. 15. City Chic 'Hot Summer Days' Print High/Low Maxi Dress 
City Chic 'Hot Summer Days' Print High/Low Maxi Dress, $119, Nordstrom.com 
The vibrant florals and hothouse colors on this maxi dress give the sheer, floating fabric a watercolor aspect. 16. Gibson Convertible Neckline Cozy Fleece Tunic 
Gibson Convertible Neckline Cozy Fleece Tunic, $54, Nordstrom.com 
The convertible collar on this sweater can go either off the shoulder or cowl, for maximum coziness. 17. BP. Faux Leather Leggings 
BP. Faux Leather Leggings, $29, Nordstrom.com 
These liquid leather leggings looklike stylish leather and feel like leggings. It is truly the best of both worlds. 18. COACH Beast Leather Passport Case 
COACH Beast Leather Passport Case, $125, Nordstrom.com 
Just don't forget this guy. I like the little dinosaur, he/she means business. 19. KUT from the Kloth Catherine Fray Hem Distressed Boyfriend Jeans 
KUT from the Kloth Catherine Fray Hem Distressed Boyfriend Jeans, $98, Nordstrom.com 
Jeans: Perfect for marching in snow or spring. 20. Jeffrey Campbell 'Stormy' Rain Boot 
Jeffrey Campbell 'Stormy' Rain Boot, $54.95, Nordstrom.com 
These rain boots scream snowflake, and they're good for stomping (they also come in matte black, if that's more your style). 21. Lucky Brand 'Bashina' Perforated Bootie 
Lucky Brand 'Bashina' Perforated Bootie, $96.90, Nordstrom.com 
The easiest basic shoe. 22. Steve Madden Edit Bootie 
Steve Madden Edit Bootie, $89.95, Nordstrom.com 
Take your bootie game to the next level with this dressy option. 23. Nike Roshe Two SE Sneaker 
Nike Roshe Two SE Sneaker, $100, Nordstrom.com 
Easy, comfortable, perfect for keeping under your desk. 
Enjoy!
